author: Erik
subject: Screencap request...
body:
Remember in Dead or Alive, where Fujiko is downloading the data off
the computer running "Banana OS?"  I'd like to get a screenshot or two
of that for one of my pages (animescripts.org).  Doesn't have to be
huge.  I seem to recall there being a file transfer bar, that'd be ideal
to have a screencap of...

  Please don't send the pic to the ML though, just stick it online
somewhere and give me (and/or the rest of us) the link.
